quotes.message: Give, and it shall be given to you. For whatever measure you deal out to others, it will be dealt to you in return.
quotes.name: The Bible

quotes.message: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid...for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
quotes.name: Psalms 30:5

quotes.message: I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
quotes.name: Jeremiah 29:11

quotes.message: If any man among you seem to be religious, and bridleth not his tongue, but deceiveth his own heart, this man's religion is vain.
quotes.name: The Bible

quotes.message: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins. Offer hospitality to one another without grumbling.
quotes.name: 1 Peter 4:8-9

quotes.message: Seek peace, and pursue it.
quotes.name: Psalms 34:14

quotes.message: And be ye kind one to another, tender-hearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
quotes.name: Ephesians 4:32

quotes.message: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do ...
quotes.name: Luke 23:34

quotes.message: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear ...
quotes.name: 1 John 4:18

quotes.message: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ ...
quotes.name: Galations 3:28

quotes.message: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about seeking whom he may devour.
quotes.name: 1 Peter v. 8.

quotes.message: For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
quotes.name: 1 Timothy 6:10

quotes.message: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
quotes.name: Isaiah 41:10

quotes.message: The name of the LORD is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
quotes.name: Proverbs 18:10

quotes.message: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make your paths straight.
quotes.name: Proverbs 3:5-6

quotes.message: Commit to the LORD whatever you do, and your plans will succeed.
quotes.name: Proverbs 16:3

quotes.message: The LORD is my light and my salvation- whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life- of whom shall I be afraid?
quotes.name: Psalm 27:1

quotes.message: Don't you know that you yourselves are God's temple and that God's Spirit lives in you?
quotes.name: 1 Corinthians 3:16

quotes.message: If anyone says, 'I love God,' yet hates his brother, he is a liar. For anyone who does not love his brother, whom he has seen, cannot love God, whom he has not seen.
quotes.name: I John 4:20

quotes.message: A fool gives full vent to his anger, but a wise man keeps himself under control.
quotes.name: Proverbs 29:11

quotes.message: Train a child in the way he should go and when he is old he will not turn from it.
quotes.name: Proverbs 22:6

quotes.message: He will give his angels charge of you to guard you in all your ways. On their hands they will bear you up, lest you dash your foot against a stone.
quotes.name: Psalms 91: 11-12

quotes.message: Are not all angels ministering spirits sent to serve those who will inherit salvation?
quotes.name: Hebrews 1:14

quotes.message: Satan himself masquerades as an angel of light.
quotes.name: 2 Corinthians 11:14

quotes.message: Fear God and keep his commandments: for this is the whole duty of man.
quotes.name: Ecclesiastes 12:13

quotes.message: Be ye angry and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath.
quotes.name: Ephesians 4:26

quotes.message: Greater love has no one than this, that he lay down his life for his friends.
quotes.name: John 15:13
